mapper.select:
SELECT FACTORY as factory, to_char(PERIODDATE,'HH24')||':00' as periodDate, STEPID as stepId, sum(WIP_GLS_QTY) as quantity, sum(STORE_MAX) as storeMax, sum(STORE_MIN) as storeMin FROM DWR_WIP_GLS_FIDS WHERE FACTORY=#{factory}
and PERIODDATE >= #{beginDate} and PERIODDATE <= #{endDate}
